abstract.para: You can use &cockpit; to search for new system updates and then apply them directly from the Web interface. On top of that, &cockpit; enables you to perform a rollback to a previous snapshot.

important.title: No system updates without registering your system
important.para: If your system is not registered, the updates are not available and the check for updates fails. Therefore, register your system to view available updates. For details, refer to .

note.title: Snapshots and updates management only for system administrators
note.para: Only users with the Server administrator role can update the system or perform a rollback to another snapshot.

topic.para: &cockpit; enables you to update your &productnameshort; instance or perform a rollback from the Software Updates menu.
